Hey there!

I'm a research scientist exploring the world of mathematical modeling and sustainability transitions. Before starting in academia, I used to be a software engineer. Besides, I've been a yogi for over 10 years and in 2022 I even did a teacher training. I do my best to integrate this mindfulness into everything I do.

Let's blend technical skills with creativity and get some exciting projects off the ground together!
